name: Physical Therapy
about: Physical therapy (PT) is care that aims to ease pain and help you function, move, and live better.

name: Diagnostics
about: Medical diagnosis is the process of determining which disease or condition explains a person's symptoms and signs.

name: Therapeutics
about: the branch of medicine concerned with the treatment of disease and the action of remedial agents.

name: Laboratory
about: A laboratory is a facility that provides controlled conditions in which scientific or technological research, experiments, and measurement may be performed.

name: Cardiology
about: Cardiology is a branch of medicine that deals with the disorders of the heart as well as some parts of the cardiovascular system.

name: Surgery
about: Surgery is a medical or dental specialty that uses operative instrumental techniques to investigate condition such as a disease or injury.
